casebody.data:
In the Matter of the Probate of the Will of Bertha L. Hamilton, Deceased. Robert Lamberton et al., Appellants; Thomas P. Heffernan, as Executor of Bertha L. Hamilton, Deceased, et al., Respondents. Argued June 10, 1946; decided July 23, 1946. *579Clarence G. Pichará, Michael D. Lombardo and Robert M. Dale for appellants. J. Russell Rogerson for respondent. Nathaniel L. Goldstem, Attorney-General (Henry S. Manley and Wendell P. Brown of counsel),

in his statutory capacity under section 12 of Personal Property Law and section 118 of Real Property Law.

Order affirmed, with costs, payable out of the fund to all parties appearing separately and filing briefs; no opinion.

Concur: Loughrax, Ch. J., Lewis, Coxway, Desmoxd, Teacher and Pule, JJ. Taking no part: Dye, J.
